channel.title: 金融时报

item.title: 摩根士丹利、瑞银和美国银行的男女薪酬差距是澳大利亚平均水平的两倍多

item.title: 意见：人力资源的失误是复杂的。即使是表面上看起来很好的想法，也往往会被赋予过多的权重，或者在采用时没有充分考虑到具体情况。在此阅读更多内容，人力资源部门是否可以有更多的？
item.description:
Opinion: The failings of HR are complex. Even apparently good ideas often get too much weight placed on them, or may be adopted without giving enough thought to the context. Read more here https://t.co/HR98vSgVW6

What could HR have more of?

— Financial Times (@FT) February 27, 2024

item.title: 丹麦首相梅特-弗雷德里克森（Mette Frederiksen）告诉《金融时报》，"天真的 "欧洲必须避免 1930 年代的错误，"加强和扩大 "其国防工业，以遏制帝国主义俄罗斯。
item.description:
Danish PM Mette Frederiksen told the Financial Times that “naive” Europe had to avoid the mistakes of the 1930s and “step up and scale up” its defence industry to contain an imperialist Russia, which has made Ukraine just its first target.

https://t.co/AliGDpvlyM

— max seddon (@maxseddon) February 27, 2024
